Night Patrol.title: Night Patrol
Night Patrol.author: Matt Zoller Seitz
Night Patrol.content: Writer-director Ryan Prows‘ “Night Patrol,” a cop corruption thriller that’s also a vampire movie, has a sprawling cast, but focuses on four characters. There’s Ethan Hawkins (Justin Long), the son of a legendary LAPD cop (Dermot Mulroney), who wants to join The Night Patrol, an unofficial, secretive, elite unit within the department that’s essentially a vampire street gang with badges and uniforms.
